Data are based on the School Basic Survey (as of May 1).
平成26年度から30年度までの設置者保有面積は，校舎，講堂・屋内運動場，寄宿舎3項目の合算値。
各種学校及び高等専門学校の設置者保有面積は，校舎，講堂・屋内運動場，寄宿舎3項目の合算値。
The area owned by the installer from 2014 to 2018 is the total value of the School buildings， Auditoriumsgymnasiums Dormitories 3 items.
The area occupied by the installers of  Miscellaneous schools and colleges of technology  is the total value of the School buildings， Auditoriumsgymnasiums， Dormitories 3 items.
